name: Bowlympus VR
description: This game was a simple exercise in my C# development courses on Unity, but things got a little out of hand, and I ended up with a prototype of a Greek  mythology themed VR bowling game, with some different environments, monsters and power-ups... so why not share it ? This is still an early-stage version, there's a lot of improvement to be done on graphic and sound design, and I plan on adding levels, bonuses and other stuff, but I think it's already quite enjoyable. So have a go, have fun with your big balls, and you're very welcome to express any thoughts - good or bad - you have on the game, and of course to report any bug you may come across.
